channel.title: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena
channel.description: Hey so I got my client and source working and now I'm testing for dupe's/bugs/exploits and it's possible to get out of the duel arena by using the dragon spear special attack. So I want to fix this, I'm in the Item list right now, but I'm not sure if I should go changing stuff in there because idk if it will fix it? Do you guys have any suggestions?

item.title: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

I am a complete noob and I dont know what region clipping is or how to find it lol, sorry. Could you link me or explain to me where to find this.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena

item.title: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Add region clipping to your server, and have it check if there are any open spaces behind you when you do a dragon spear special, otherwise just move forwards.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena

item.title: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

Basically what the special atack of the Dragon Spear does in runescape is it pushes the player you are attacking back one block and stuns them for a second, now in real runescape they have made it so that the special attack only works on a regular walking surface such as grass or anywhere that doesnt have an object on top of it. But in many runescape private server’s this isn’t installed so when the special attack is used on another player it pushes them and the player who used the special attack through any block, essentially creating a noclip of kinds. So when used in the duel arena you can escape then run to edgeville and die with tons of items only to spawn back in the duel arena with all of it with you.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Spear glitch in duel arena
